attributes.action: Lower the Government's tax on petrol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see petrol tax decreased rapidly, like our American counterparts whose petrol is less than half the price of ours.  I am a student who can barely afford to keep my car running, and it shouldn't be one of the biggest bills at my age

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
